title: CFTC gives prediction markets leeway on data and record-keeping rules
contentSnippet: The CFTC gave “no-action” letters to a group of prediction markets, including Polymarket US, exempting them from swap data reporting and record-keeping regulations.

title: Animoca Brands Japan、ビットコイン分散型金融「Solv Protocol」とMOU締結
contentSnippet: アニモカジャパンはSolv ProtocolとMOUを締結し、企業のビットコイン保有・運用を支援するDAT領域で協力を拡大。BTCFi活用による財務戦略の高度化を目指す。

title: Web3 gaming shifts to sustainability as confidence returns: BGA
contentSnippet: The Blockchain Game Alliance reports industry confidence rose to 66% as developers pivoted from speculation to sustainable models following a funding collapse since 2021.

title: 米CFTC、ポリマーケットなど4社にデータ規制で柔軟対応
contentSnippet: 米CFTCが予測市場運営4社にノーアクションレターを発行し、特定の記録保管要件を免除。業界全体の取引高は2025年1-10月で279億ドル（約4兆2000億円）に達し、急成長が続いている。

title: Dogecoin Hovers Near Key Support as Fed Easing Fails to Spark Risk Rally
contentSnippet: Despite elevated trading activity, Dogecoin faces resistance near $0.1425, and its future movement is likely dependent on broader market sentiment.

title: Stablecoins Get Backing From Cross-Party UK Lawmakers Urging Pro-Innovation Rules
contentSnippet: The group calls for a forward-looking framework to maintain the U.K.'s fintech leadership and attract international investment.

title: YouTube Now Lets US Creators Take Earnings in PayPal's Stablecoin: Report
contentSnippet: YouTube has reportedly adopted the feature shortly after PayPal enabled PYUSD as a payout method for recipients in the third quarter.

title: CFTC pulls ‘actual delivery’ crypto guidance, giving flexibility to exchanges
contentSnippet: The CFTC has scrapped its guidance on how crypto is delivered in a transaction, giving “way more flexibility for exchanges,” says StarkWare's Katherine Kirkpatrick Bos.

title: YouTube enables PYUSD stablecoin payouts for US creators: Report
contentSnippet: Fortune reported that YouTube is allowing creators to be paid in PayPal's stablecoin, a potential boon for adoption due to the platform's size.

title: Elliptic Flags Global Crypto Pivot as Banks, Stablecoins and Asian Hubs Take the Lead
contentSnippet: Elliptic noted a worldwide pivot toward innovation, highlighting U.S. shifts, stablecoin adoption, and APAC–Middle East regulatory momentum.

title: コインベース、予測市場とトークン化株式ローンチ予定＝ブルームバーグ
contentSnippet: 米最大手仮想通貨取引所コインベースが12月17日に予測市場とトークン化株式を発表予定。ジェミニのCFTCライセンス取得やDTCCのトークン化承認など、業界の競争激化と規制進展が加速している。

title: XRP Lands on Solana, Ethereum and Others, in Boost for Ripple Ecosystem
contentSnippet: Wrapped XRP will be tradable on Solana, Ethereum and other chains, allowing exposure across DeFi applications without unregulated third-party bridges.

title: Bitcoin's Persistent Long-Term Buyers Step In as Market Struggles For Liquidity
contentSnippet: Experts remain cautiously optimistic as macro hurdles clear amid Bitcoin whale accumulation and liquidity drying up ahead of the holidays.

title: テラフォームラボのド・クォン創業者に懲役15年の判決　ステーブルコインUST崩壊背景に
contentSnippet: テラフォームラボのド・クォン創業者に米国地裁で懲役15年の判決。2022年のアルゴリズム型ステーブルコインUST崩壊により数兆円の被害をもたらしていた。

title: YouTube、クリエイター報酬でペイパルのステーブルコイン支払いに対応
contentSnippet: フォーチューン誌によると、ユーチューブが動画プラットフォームのクリエイターに対し、ペイパルのステーブルコインPYUSDでの報酬受け取りを選択できるようにした。現在は米国ユーザーのみに適用される。

title: Bitcoin bounces on Fed rate cut with bigger rally ahead predicted
contentSnippet: Crypto markets rebounded after the Fed’s third rate cut this year, with analysts predicting a larger bounce following the typical post-cut pattern.

title: Binance cozies up to Trump’s crypto platform with USD1 stablecoin links
contentSnippet: Binance added a host of zero-fee trading pairs for the Trump family’s stablecoin and used it to back its own stablecoin collateral.

title: ビットコイン9万ドル割れから反発、売り圧力後退も流入資金は半減
contentSnippet: 12日の暗号資産市場でビットコイン（BTC）はFOMC後に一時9万ドルを割り込んだが米国時間にかけて反発した。ただアナリストは売り圧力減少による反発と指摘し、ステーブルコイン流入が8月比50%減の760億ドルまで縮小した。新たな流動性回復まで上昇は限定的で、週足9万3000ドル確保が強気継続の条件に。

title: Trump’s New AI Order Sets Up Federal Fight With US States Over Industry Regulation
contentSnippet: The White House has directed the DOJ to challenge state AI laws and highlighted Colorado’s algorithmic discrimination statute.

title: SEC clears DTCC to offer securities market tokenization service
contentSnippet: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation plans to tokenize stocks, ETFs and US Treasurys next year after receiving an SEC no-action letter.

title: Stablecoins Gain Ground in Blockchain Gaming as Studios Tighten Spending, Study Finds
contentSnippet: New industry data shows developers leaning on stablecoins and disciplined business models as blockchain studios adjust to cooling markets.

title: コインベース、ソラナ系トークンの直接取引を開始　上場審査不要で即時売買
contentSnippet: 米仮想通貨取引所大手コインベースが、アプリ内でソラナ系トークンをDEX経由で直接取引できる新機能を発表。従来の上場審査なしで数百万種類のトークンに即座にアクセス可能。1.2億ユーザーに順次展開予定。

title: 国税庁が調査結果を発表、暗号資産取引の追徴税額46億円に
contentSnippet: 国税庁が令和6事務年度の調査結果を公表。暗号資産取引に対する追徴税額は46億円で前年比31%増、1件当たり745万円と全体平均の2.5倍に。政府は分離課税導入に向け調整を進めている。

title: Bitcoin miners could boost corporate adoption as crypto treasury buys slow
contentSnippet: Bitcoin miners Marathon Digital Holdings, Riot Platforms and Hut 8 are already in the top ten largest public companies holding Bitcoin.

title: OpenAI Launches GPT-5.2 Amid Expanded Major Contracts
contentSnippet: OpenAI unveiled GPT-5.2, featuring upgrades for scientific, mathematical, and software tasks, as employers mull AI for technical work.

title: 米上院銀行委員会長、仮想通貨「クラリティ法案」で銀行幹部らと協議
contentSnippet: 米上院銀行委員長がビットコインなど仮想通貨の市場構造を定める法案で銀行業界と協議し、進展があったと報告した。ステーブルコイン利回りやDeFiが法案の争点となっている。

title: SEC Approves DTCC Pilot to Record US Securities on Select Blockchains Via 'Registered' Wallets
contentSnippet: The three-year program will allow the market’s central clearinghouse to create tokenized entitlements under modified regulatory oversight.

title: 米CFTC、仮想通貨取引の引き渡し規則を撤廃　規制緩和へ
contentSnippet: 米CFTCが仮想通貨の「現物引き渡し」に関する2020年ガイダンスを撤回。ファム委員長代行は「時代遅れで過度に複雑」と指摘し、規制簡素化へ。12月には現物取引承認やパイロットプログラム開始など、トランプ政権下で仮想通貨規制の整備が加速。

title: CFTC Gives No-Action Leeway to Polymarket, Gemini, PredictIt, LedgerX Over Data Rules
contentSnippet: The CFTC granted the operators of Polymarket, PredictIt, Gemini and LedgerX permission to skip certain recordkeeping requirements.

title: Google's New Browser Promises to End the Tyranny of the Tab
contentSnippet: Google's Disco builds custom apps from your open tabs, hinting at a post-search future.

title: Do Kwon Sentenced to 15 Years in Prison Over $40 Billion Terra Crypto Collapse
contentSnippet: Terraform Labs founder Do Kwon was sentenced to 15 years in prison, following the $40 billion collapse of UST and Luna in May 2022.

title: Terraform co-founder sentenced to 15 years in prison after guilty plea
contentSnippet: A federal judge heard statements from some of Terraform Labs’ and Do Kwon’s victims for hours before deciding on the co-founder’s sentence.

title: Terraform's Do Kwon Sentenced to 15 Years in Prison for Fraud
contentSnippet: The Terraform Labs co-founder pleaded guilty to conspiracy and wire fraud in August.

title: Bitcoin, blockchain should form Pakistan’s new financial rail, minister says
contentSnippet: The remarks signal Pakistan’s push to turn its grassroots crypto activity into a compliant, innovation-driven sector anchored by Bitcoin and digital-asset regulation.

title: Save the Children Launches Bitcoin Fund as Aid Groups Look for Faster Crisis Payments
contentSnippet: Save the Children introduced a Bitcoin fund aimed at speeding cash assistance during emergencies and expanding its use of crypto tools.

title: U.S. Financial-Risk Watchdog, FSOC, Erased Digital Assets as a Potential Hazard
contentSnippet: From Donald Trump's crypto-friendly regulators, the yearly report that once flagged financial-stability risks is no longer issuing "vulnerability" warnings.

title: Bitcoin Rebounds to $93K From Post-Fed Lows, but Altcoins Remain Under Pressure
contentSnippet: Downward pressure on bitcoin is losing steam, with the market stabilizing but not yet out of the woods, said one analyst.

title: Chainlink's LINK Drops 5% Despite Coinbase Bridge Deal, But Bottoming Signs Emerge
contentSnippet: Coinbase tapped Chainlink services for $7 billion bridge, but broader crypto weakness weighed on price.

title: U.S. CFTC's Pham Moves for Do-Over on 'Actual Delivery' Guidance on Crypto
contentSnippet: In what are likely her final days at the agency, the acting chairman checked another box from President Donald Trump's crypto agenda.

title: Coinbase Expands Reach of Stablecoin-Based AI Agent Payments Tool
contentSnippet: The updated protocol, x402 V2, allows developers to combine payments, enable secure wallet access, and add new features via a clean, modular design.
